attributes.action: Shut-down vulnerable places (schools, public places)for  4 weeks and monitor,
attributes.additional_details: Shut down completely for 4 weeks including Easter break, impact minimum as Easter in vicinity reduces school shut down to two weeks only,
attributes.background: The current situation is not helping citizens and creating a situation of fear, with places of assembly being closed it will mitigate the risks and trying for four weeks includes Easter break as week, this will contain the spread of virus until a solution is found
